channel.title: How do i make my self a owner on scaperune!
channel.description:
HOW DO I MAKE MY SELF A OWNER ON SCAPERUNE!!!!!!!!!!!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
been trying for days plzzzz help!!!!

item.title: How do i make my self a owner on scaperune!
item.dc:creator: @sosodeaf sosodeaf
item.description:
@sosodeaf wrote:

its simple go into server>search your username. open it then put player rights 2

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self a owner on scaperune!

item.title: How do i make my self a owner on scaperune!
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Firstly, no need to TYPE LIKE THIS, and secondly is the problem that you can’t make yourself owner or that you can’t run your server. As in your two posts you describe two very different problems. If you can get the source to load and want to make yourself an owner, make sure you are logged out and set your character rights to 3, save it and log back it. If this doesnt work make sure there arn’t multiple copies of your character file as some servers seem to have one copy in the bin. If that fails you can probably just search for the owner of the sources char file and delete his password, and then use his account.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self a owner on scaperune!

item.title: How do i make my self a owner on scaperune!
item.dc:creator: @pinhead936 pinhead936
item.description:
@pinhead936 wrote:

Go in to character files, Find your account, and change
PlayerRights = 0
to
PlayerRights = 3

rights 1 = mod, 2 = admin , 3 = owner, 4= somtimes hidden owner

(:

Read full topic
